original_text: But now we are released from the law, having died to that which held us captive, so that we serve in the new way of the Spirit and not in the old way of the written code.
korean_text: 이제는 우리가 얽매였던 것에 대하여 죽었으므로 율법에서 벗어났으니 이러므로 우리가 영의 새로운 것으로 섬길 것이요 율법 조문의 묵은 것으로 아니할지니라

sentences.original_text: But now we are released from the law
having died to that which held us captive
so that we serve in the new way of the Spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 우리가 영의 새로운 방법으로 섬기려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and not in the old way of the written code
